author: dev-masih
description: This module contains functions to create a world map as a shape of a graph and the ability to manipulate it at any time, easily see debug drawing of this graph and move game objects inside of this graph with utilizing auto pathfinder.
name: DefGraph

releases.message:
* Fixed issue that when a game object will reach the last destination it has a minor flicker.
* `ROUTETYPE` members `onetime`, `shuffle` and `cycle` are changed to `ONETIME`, `SHUFFLE` and `CYCLE`.
* Lots of code quality and style improvements and optimized memory and speed consumption.
Added multidestination with 3 different routing types with bug fixes. **Changelog and migration guild from version 3 to 4**
This release contains a fix for a scaling bug #4: rotating game object at the exact opposite direction
**Changelog and migration guild from version 2 to 3** (Please use v3.1, this release contain a bug on rotation calculation)
**Changelog and migration guild from version 1 to 2**
